SYSTEM: Ontologies-Methodology.pdf: P치gina 33
33
Ontology Requirements Specification. Task 8
출 Input: the list of identified CQs and their answers 
출 Objective: to extract from the list of CQs a pre-
glossary to be used in the conceptualization activity. 
Obtaining a list of the most used terms
출 Techniques: terminology extraction techniques 
and tools supporting such techniques
From the requirements in form of competency 
questions, we extract the terminology (names , 
adjectives and verbs) that will be formally 
represented in the ontology by means of concepts, 
attributes and relations. 
From the answers to the CQs we extract the objects 
in the universe of discourse that will be represented 
as instances.
speaker: SYSTEM
